pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto aññatarassa kulassa kulūpako hoti niccabhattiko.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.3: Yaṃ tasmiṃ kule uppajjati khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā tato āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa paṭiviso ṭhapiyyati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena sāyaṃ tasmiṃ kule maṃsaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.5: Tato āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa paṭiviso ṭhapito hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.6: Tassa kulassa dārako rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya rodati—“maṃsaṃ me dethā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.7: Atha kho so puriso pajāpatiṃ etadavoca—“ayyassa paṭivisaṃ dārakassa dehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.9: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya yena taṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.10: Atha kho so puriso yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.11: “hiyyo kho, bhante, sāyaṃ maṃsaṃ uppannaṃ ahosi. Tato ayyassa paṭiviso ṭhapito.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.12: Ayaṃ, bhante, dārako rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya rodati—‘maṃsaṃ me dethā’ti. Ayyassa paṭiviso dārakassa dinno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.17: Atha kho so puriso āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa kahāpaṇaṃ datvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—“Yatheva mayaṃ rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma evamevime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.18: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassa purisassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.19: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.20: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.21: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.25: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.27: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.28: “Yo pana bhikkhu jātarūparajataṃ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.36: kahāpaṇo lohamāsako dārumāsako jatumāsako ye vohāraṃ gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.42: idaṃ ayyassa hotūti upanikkhittaṃ sādiyati, nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.45: tena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.51: Sace tattha āgacchati ārāmiko vā upāsako vā so vattabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.58: sappi vā telaṃ vā madhu vā phāṇitaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.59: Sace so tena parivattetvā kappiyaṃ āharati rūpiyappaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbeheva paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.64: no ce chaḍḍeti, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu rūpiyachaḍḍako sammannitabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.65: yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, chaḍḍitāchaḍḍitañca jāneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.68: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.70: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ rūpiyachaḍḍakaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.74: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno rūpiyachaḍḍakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.79: Tena sammatena bhikkhunā animittaṃ katvā pātetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.80: Sace nimittaṃ katvā pāteti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.81: Rūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.82: Rūpiye vematiko rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.83: Rūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:1.88: ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipati—
